Package server

Class ServerController

java.lang.Object
server.ServerController
public class ServerController extends Object
ServerController class is the main controller class for the ServerApp. It handles server connect and disconnect actions, users import and console appendage (From GUI)

  • Constructor Details

    • ServerController

      public ServerController()

  • Method Details

    • connectToServer

      public void connectToServer()
      Connects to the server by creating a serverBackEnd object and connects to mysql DB. It appends to server console the appropriate message.

    • reportScheduler

      private void reportScheduler()
      Schedules a ReportGenerator to run on the first day of the next month with Timer object(runs once).

    • disconnectFromServer

      public void disconnectFromServer() throws IOException
      Disconnects from the server and drops the connection to mysql DB and appends a message to server console.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs when closing the server

    • appendConsole

      public void appendConsole(String str)
      Appends a string to the server console.
      Parameters:
      str - String to be appended to console.

    • initialize

      protected void initialize()
      Initializes the connected client table (when server app is up)

    • addConnected

      protected void addConnected(InetAddress connected)
      Adds the given IP to connectedObserv
      Parameters:
      connected - The InetAddress IP to be added

    • removeConnected

      protected void removeConnected(InetAddress connected)
      Removes the given IP from connectedObserv
      Parameters:
      connected - The InetAddress IP to be removed

    • closeConnection

      public void closeConnection()
      Closes the server connection and exits the program.

    • importUsers

      public void importUsers(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Performs server back end Utility import.
      Parameters:
      event - ActionEvent that triggers the action
